definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lick (NH id.; so Aram. [[לְחַךְ]] lh.ak; Ar. lah.ika; -

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[כִּלְחׂךְ]] Nu 22:4 (E), sq. acc.; of ox licking up grass.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[לִחֵָכָה]] 1Ki 18:38; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְלַחֲכוּ]] Nu 22:4, Mic 7:17; [[יְלַחֵָכוּ]] Ps 72:9, Is 43:23; lick up (sq. acc.), fire fr. heaven the water in trench 1Ki 18:38; of Isr. consuming produce of land Nu 22:3(E); esp. [[עָפָר]] ´[[ל]] lick the dust, sign of humiliation Mic 7:17, Ps 72:9, Is 49:23.
